title: BeerJSONModel
description: A simple schema to describe an inventory period.

startDate.description: Start date of the period, inclusive. Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss. UTC is assumed timezone.

endDate.description: End date of the period, exclusive (minus 1 second). So 2018-12-31T00:00:00 is interpreted as 2018-12-31T23:59:59

closed.description: If the period is closed, no more transactions can be added to it.
